commit.message:
replace shallow_copy_rtx_stat with c++

gcc/ChangeLog:

2017-07-28  Trevor Saunders  <tbsaunde+gcc@tbsaunde.org>

	* rtl.c (shallow_copy_rtx_stat): Remove _stat from name.
	* rtl.h (shallow_copy_rtx): Remove macro.

From-SVN: r250708
